pullrequest.title: Switch to six independent GPS sensor noise models

content.raw: Are you happy with how I have changed this deprecated ```Sensor::GetNoise(unsigned int _index)``` to be compatible with the way in which noise streams are now managed by the ```Sensor``` class? I have essentially coded a sensor-specific mapping between the old integers and the new enums. The only exception is the ```MultiCameraSensor```, where I use the integer index directly.
content.html: Are you happy with how I have changed this deprecated Sensor::GetNoise(unsigned int _index) to be compatible with the way in which noise streams are now managed by the Sensor class? I have essentially coded a sensor-specific mapping between the old integers and the new enums. The only exception is the MultiCameraSensor, where I use the integer index directly.
